Description

Details

lcm_eventlog_t

typedef struct {
    FILE *f;
    int64_t eventcount;
} lcm_eventlog_t;

lcm_eventlog_event_t

typedef struct {
    int64_t eventnum, timestamp;
    int32_t channellen, datalen;

    char     *channel;
    void     *data;
} lcm_eventlog_event_t;
